Method Detail

area

public double area()
area() and computeCentroid() are adapted from the implementation of polygon.java published from a princeton case study The study is here: http://introcs.cs.princeton.edu/java/35purple/ The polygon.java source is here: http://introcs.cs.princeton.edu/java/35purple/Polygon.java.html

isInArea

public boolean isInArea(float testx,
                        float testy)
This is a java port of the W. Randolph Franklin algorithm explained here http://www.ecse.rpi.edu/Homepages/wrf/Research/Short_Notes/pnpoly.html
